zh.title: Tensorlinx正在向redox开发小组进行资助 - Tensorlinx
zh.pageSubtitle: 了解Tensorlinx最新动态、技术突破和行业洞察

article.title: Tensorlinx正在向redox开发小组进行资助
article.meta: 发布时间：2025年3月10日 | 作者：Tensorlinx团队 | 分类：企业公告
content: Tensorlinx正在使用NAVF流动储备向redox开发小组进行资助，包括参与维护。这一行为不代表政治目的，是我们社会使命的一部分。
Redox是一个用Rust语言编写的通用操作系统，旨在提供安全、可靠、高性能的计算环境。作为开源社区的重要成员，Redox项目致力于构建一个现代化的操作系统内核，采用微内核架构设计，从根本上提升系统的安全性和稳定性。
Tensorlinx此次资助将主要用于支持Redox项目的核心开发工作，包括系统内核优化、驱动程序开发、以及用户空间工具的完善。我们相信，通过支持这样的开源项目，能够推动整个计算机基础设施领域的技术进步。
作为一家专注于计算机基础设施建设的企业，Tensorlinx始终将技术创新和社会责任视为企业发展的核心驱动力。我们坚信，开源软件是现代技术生态的基石，支持开源项目的发展就是投资于整个行业的未来。
此次资助是Tensorlinx长期开源战略的一部分。未来，我们将继续寻找并支持更多具有创新潜力的开源项目，为构建更加开放、安全、高效的数字世界贡献力量。

en.title: Tensorlinx is Providing Funding to the Redox Development Team - Tensorlinx
en.pageSubtitle: Stay informed about Tensorlinx's latest developments, technical breakthroughs, and industry insights

article.title: Tensorlinx is Providing Funding to the Redox Development Team
article.meta: Published: February 20, 2026 | Author: Tensorlinx Team | Category: Company Announcement
content: Tensorlinx is using NAVF liquid reserves to fund the Redox development team, including participation in maintenance. This action does not represent political purposes and is part of our social mission.

Redox is a general-purpose operating system written in Rust, designed to provide a secure, reliable, and high-performance computing environment. As an important member of the open-source community, the Redox project is committed to building a modern operating system kernel using a microkernel architecture, fundamentally improving system security and stability.

Tensorlinx's funding will primarily support the core development work of the Redox project, including system kernel optimization, driver development, and the improvement of user-space tools. We believe that by supporting such open-source projects, we can drive technological advancement across the entire computer infrastructure field.

As a company focused on computer infrastructure construction, Tensorlinx always regards technological innovation and social responsibility as the core drivers of enterprise development. We firmly believe that open-source software is the cornerstone of the modern technology ecosystem, and supporting the development of open-source projects is an investment in the future of the entire industry.

This funding is part of Tensorlinx's long-term open-source strategy. In the future, we will continue to seek out and support more open-source projects with innovative potential, contributing to the construction of a more open, secure, and efficient digital world.
